doc:
Earl W. Bascom https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earl_W._Bascom 0 Earl Wesley Bascom (June 19, 1906 – August 28, 1995) was an American painter, printmaker, rodeo performer and sculptor, raised in Canada, who portrayed his own experiences cowboying and rodeoing across the American and Canadian West. Earl_Wesley_Bascom ( June_19_,_1906 – August_28_,_1995 ) was an_American_painter , printmaker , rodeo_performer_and_sculptor , raised in Canada , who portrayed his_own_experiences cowboying_and_rodeoing across the_American_and_Canadian_West .
